channel.title: Tops on A Tinkerer's Canvas
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on A Tinkerer's Canvas

item.title: Projects
item.description: My Projects Hey there! I like to call myself as a creative workaholic, and love making novel stuff, which can be something out-of-the-box. My Github activity: So without further banter, let me show you some of them: 1. OpnEco Description “Ah, if only I could get someone to read this for feedback.” “Only if I could know which keywords to target…” We all have been there, haven’t we? OpnEco is a Python3 project developed just for that.

item.title: Other Blogs
item.description: Technical Blogs Art of Problem Solving This is my oldest blog, which is quite inactive now. But to be honest, this was the first blog that I worked on seriously. So many good memories abound… You can find a lot of math and CS content here. Even a series on ML simply explained. I use the pseudonym A-student there. My AoPS Blog Hashnode My Hashnode blog My College Club blogs 1.

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? Roy. Anuran Roy. (I like James Bond.) I’m a machine that converts coffee to code. I am a sophocrat sophomore at VIT Vellore. Thanks to the CoVid pandemic and the lockdown it gave us for free, I am still at home, not waiting to go to college. In the meantime, I am trying to learn a few stuff (read Web Dev and Competitive Coding :P). This is one such (noobish) example of how much I have developed in web dev :P
